languages.text: "Что вы! Как обокрасть обладателя столь могучих орудий!"
"Of course not! How can one steal from the wielder of such mighty weapons!"
languages.original_text: "Что вы! Как обокрасть обладателя столь могучих орудий!"

traits.locale_text: "Of course not! How can one steal from the wielder of such mighty weapons!"
"Of course not! How can one steal from the wielder of such mighty weapons!"
"Of course not! How can one steal from the wielder of such mighty weapons!"
"Of course not! How can one steal from the wielder of such mighty weapons!"
"Of course not! How can one steal from the wielder of such mighty weapons!"
"Of course not! How can one steal from the wielder of such mighty weapons!"

languages.text: "Natürlich nicht! Wer würde jemanden bestehlen, der über so mächtige Waffen verfügt?"
languages.original_text: "Of course not! How can one steal from the wielder of such mighty weapons!"

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich nicht! Wer würde jemanden bestehlen, der über so mächtige Waffen verfügt?"

languages.text: « Bien sûr que non ! Comment pourrait-on détrousser l'heureux propriétaire d'un arsenal aussi redoutable ? »
languages.original_text: "Of course not! How can one steal from the wielder of such mighty weapons!"

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr que non ! Comment pourrait-on détrousser l'heureux propriétaire d'un arsenal aussi redoutable ? »

languages.text: «¡Desde luego que no! ¡Cómo podríamos siquiera robar al dueño de un arma tan formidable!».
languages.original_text: "Of course not! How can one steal from the wielder of such mighty weapons!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Desde luego que no! ¡Cómo podríamos siquiera robar al dueño de un arma tan formidable!».

languages.text: 「まさかそんな！そんな強力な武器の使い手から、どうやって盗めるってんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Of course not! How can one steal from the wielder of such mighty weapons!"

traits.locale_text: 「まさかそんな！そんな強力な武器の使い手から、どうやって盗めるってんだ！」

languages.text: “当然不是！要是谁有这么厉害的武器，哪还有人敢从他们手里抢东西呢？”
languages.original_text: "Of course not! How can one steal from the wielder of such mighty weapons!"

traits.locale_text: “当然不是！要是谁有这么厉害的武器，哪还有人敢从他们手里抢东西呢？”

languages.text: "Tabii ki değil! Böylesine kudretli silahları kullananlardan çalmak mümkün olabilir mi?"
languages.original_text: "Of course not! How can one steal from the wielder of such mighty weapons!"
